dt: {bc}a first or chief person: such as
{bc}a member of a jury who acts as chairman and spokesman
{bc}a chief and often specially trained worker who works with and usually leads a gang or crew
{bc}a person in charge of a group of workers, a particular operation, or a section of a plant

shortdef: a first or chief person: such as
a member of a jury who acts as chairman and spokesman
a chief and often specially trained worker who works with and usually leads a gang or crew
